Upcoming: ApacheCon Austin

In just a couple weeks, I’ll be at ApacheCon US 2006 in Austin Texas. I am not giving a presentation this year. I am hoping to find some time to hack on the Event MPM. Maybe even have the time to finish the Async Read/Write stuff that Brian was working on earlier this year.
